Welcome to Jekyll!

January 15, 2014 Jekyll

I'm going to start blogging properly now! I really wanted to have a blog with thoughts and ideas, but things kept falling short; however, this time I've taken the time to use Jekyll and create my own template! It's definitely a great piece of blogging software that you should check out! It's actually really easy to use too! I'm excited to start blogging again. I hope you join me in my adventures!
